Package crimp::bmp 0.2
Meta platform win32-x86_64
Meta build::date 2022-06-10
Meta generated::by {critcl 3.1.18} ashok
Meta generated::date critcl
Meta license Under a BSD license.
Meta author {Andreas Kupries}
Meta summary Extension of the CRIMP core to handle import and export of
Meta summary BMP images
Meta description This package provides the CRIMP eco-system with the
Meta description functionality to handle images stored as Windows Bitmap
Meta description (BMP).
Meta subject image {BMP image} {Portable PixMap} {BMP import}
Meta subject {BMP export} image {image import} {image export}
Meta require {crimp::core 0.2} {Tcl 8.5}
Meta included tcl/policy_bmp_1.tcl critcl-rt.tcl
Meta included win32-x86_64/crimp_bmp.dll
Meta entrytclcommand {eval [list ::apply {dir {
    source [file join $dir critcl-rt.tcl]
    set path [file join $dir [::critcl::runtime::MapPlatform]]
    set ext [info sharedlibextension]
    set lib [file join $path "crimp_bmp$ext"]
    load $lib Crimp_bmp
    ::critcl::runtime::Fetch $dir policy_bmp_1.tcl
    package provide crimp::bmp 0.2
}} $dir]}
